original_title: All set to recruit 5,450 new graduates as teachers: Susil
original_body_lines: Cabinet approval has been granted to recruit 5,450 graduates as teachers according to the Teacher Service Constitution, Education Minister Susil Premajayantha said.

These teachers will be recruited for main subjects such as science, technology, English and foreign languages in relation to the provinces, and the recruitment is to be done by the provinces in the future.
Addressing an event organised in Badulla recently, Minister Premajayantha said the teachers will be recruited to national schools through the Education Ministry.
The proposal to merge all National Institutes of Education (NIEs) and convert them into a single university in the future has also been presented in the form of a Concept Paper, he added.
The Minister further said that all arrangements are in place to provide textbooks and school uniforms before the end of 2024. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
